phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
And while we are at it...
Do not you think so, Mister Yami?
And now, you are officially a member of the Magic Knights Squad, the Black Bulls!
You better work hard not to shame Mister Yami or the Black Bulls!
It is a pleasure to work with all of you!
I will be more careful next time!
The captain just told you to shut up!
That is the other new recruit?
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
Is not it depressing how small and filthy it is?
By the way, my room is twice as big
I-I have never had my own room!
At the church, we all shared a room, so we would sleep lined up next to each other.
I am going to get you so clean!
Until you are all sparkly and shiny!
You are free to do whatever until we get a mission.
To everyone at that church of yours.
I am sure they are worried about how things turned out.
Do not make anyone worry about you.
That is how to be a real man.
If you need anything, come see me.
I am going to climb my way up to Wizard King from here.
I am not going to lose.
This room is wasted on you.
Tomorrow, I will be lecturing you on your duties as a Magic Knight.
I would rather not be your instructor,
but the captain ordered me to do so, and as such, I have no choice.
I have a name, and it is Yuno, Klaus.
You will address me with respect.
He made it into the Magic Knights!
I have to let the whole village know!
So, Sister, what does the letter from Asta say?
We will have to cheer him up when he comes back.
I am sure even Asta would be depressed about that.
We will have a super tato party.
Th-Then I guess he will not be coming home.
All right, I am going to tell the whole village!
This is the first bit of good news we have gotten since Hage Village was founded!
So Asta passed, too... I see.
I do not think it was here yesterday.
Do not worry about a pillar.
The base itself changes its shape all the time.
You will get used to it.
You are in for a treat.
I will personally show you around the Black Bulls' super cool base!
You do not need the moron part!
This kind of heat is nothing to a member of the Black Bulls!
I want to add cold water.
Hanging out naked is nice, though.
Over there are all the girls' rooms.
If any of us guys go in, you will be killed by trap magic.
I will let you have the duty of taking care of all the animals.
It is a very honorable role.
I really do not want to let you have it, but I will.
Feed'them twice a day, in the morning and at night.
Go on, give it a try.
You can have plenty of fun here.
I am not going to lose!
She is the other new recruit this year!
I love the sound of that!
I am Asta, from Hage Village!
Let us do our best together!
It is nice to meet you!
I did not give you permission to speak to me.
I barely sense any mana from you, you lowly insect.
I belong to the royal family of this kingdom.
I am but a puny insect that someone could blow away just by breathing.
Who are you calling an insect, huh?!
We are supposed to be colleagues as Magic Knights!
Who cares if you are royalty?!
Are foolish peasants unable to understand this with words alone?
I guess I will have to show you with the difference between our magical powers.
I will not make it in ti
What do you think you are doing to your senior?!
You were just standing in the wrong spot.
Who gave you permission to stand there?
I do not care if you are royalty or the Silver Eagles' captain's little sister!
I mean, the only person who would accept a spoiled brat like you is Mister Yami!
I held back because you are a girl, but now I am going to have to initiate you, too, damn it!
Like I want to be in this pathetic squad.
What the hell do you think you are doing?!
Who cares about the Black Bulls?
I do not need that filthy thing.
This is the absolute worst Magic Knights Squad,
and it is not where royalty like myself belongs!
Apologize to the robe and Mister Yami!
The robe I worked so hard to get...
What the heck was her problem?
I could not find the toilet and ended up outside.
Why will not it go the way...
Apparently, the youngest of the Silva family cannot even control her magical powers.
Who would have thought someone like that would be born into the royal family?
What is with that flimsy little grimoire?
It is just pathetic that you cannot even control your powers.
It disgusts me that you are my little sister.
I will not have someone as shameful as you in the Silver Eagles.
Why could not you have died instead of our mother?
I will make them acknowledge me!
I guess she is got it rough, too.
I am going to be mocked again...
I will not have someone as shameful as you in the Silver Eagles.
It is just pathetic that you cannot even control your powers.
Guess I will go back to bed now.
Someone is magic is out of control.
This is going to get bad if we do not do something.
If we attack it with magic, she might not make it out alive.
Could you use your spatial magic to scoop just her up?
If only we had someone who could nullify magical powers...
You came flying by at the perfect time.
Could you go take care of that?
How am I supposed to get over there, though?
Now is the time when you need to go beyond your limits!
That was so much fun, was not it?
They are going to mock me again.
I do not have any magical powers, so I am jealous, damn it!
If you train so you can learn to control them,
I am going to keep doing my best so I will not lose, either!
You just could not control your magical powers?
You should have told me earlier, you royal failure.
We are a whole group of failures!
No one cares if you have a flaw or two, you idiot.
Anyway, thank goodness you are safe.
By the way, I know a great pasta place.
Before that, you should try this.
If anything, the one thing I am great at is controlling magical powers,
so I will help you out.
I will show you some womanly techniques, too.
I will tell you how much of an angel my little sister Marie is.
Let us start out as friends.
Let us do our best together.
It is a pleasure to work with you.
No one can escape from here
Once again in the small closed off classroom
The star of the class was shining yet again
They shine so bright that I close my eyes
That the revolution was within my hands
If you want to laugh, go ahead and laugh
The rest of us who were left behind wanted to become something
We repeat the same morning over and over
You are the only one who can choose your tomorrow
Let us go beyond our current selves
I am Noelle Silva, and I am a royal (ouzoku).
Who are you calling a bandit?
Who are you calling a pirate?
Our first mission as Magic Knights!
I will kick ass and go straight to being Wizard King!
The mission is to hunt boars?
Black Clover, Page 8: Go! Go! First Mission.
Not giving up is my magic!
